result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael Jamal Elliott

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Michael Jamal Elliott not in court, in custody.  Attorney Michael J Cerniglia in court via Zoom for Michael Jamal Elliott.  Attorney Alexandria S. Carlson in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a Status Conference. 
Defense advises the court that defendant is not eligible for treatment court. For reasons stated on the record, defense requests final pretrial and jury trial dates.
Final pre-trial scheduled for November 16, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Jury status hearing scheduled for December 2, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Jury trial scheduled for December 7, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Michael Jamal Elliott in court, in custody.  Attorney Michael J Cerniglia in court for Michael Jamal Elliott.  Attorney Alexandria S. Carlson in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a final pretrial. Defense state the defendant may be eligible for drug treatment court and scheduled a TAD evaluation. Defense requests to vacate the scheduled jury trial date. State does not object. Court grants defense's requests and vacate the scheduled jury trial date. Case remains calendared in Branch 36.
Status conference scheduled for October 21, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant's Pretrial Motion.  Received and Filed.  nk
Defendant's Proposed Witness List.  Received and Filed.  nk

Defendant Michael Jamal Elliott in court with attorney Michael J Cerniglia.  Defendant Michael Jamal Elliott in custody.  Alexandria S. Carlson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for a final pre-trial.  Defendant is scheduled for a TAD evaluation.  Court adjourns matter and reschedules final pre-trial.  Jury Trial remains calendared on September 12, 2022 at 08:30 AM for first call.  Case adjourned to Branch 36, Rm 316 SB.  Final pre-trial scheduled for September 8, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Received and Filed: State's Requested Jury Instructions
Received and Filed: State's Motion in Limine

Attorney Michael J Cerniglia in court, defendant Michael Jamal Elliott not in court, in custody.  Jessica Bellows appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy Court Clerk: STW  
Case set for scheduling conference. Defense has received discovery and an offer and requests matter be set for final pretrial and jury trial. Case set for final pretrial and Jury Trial. Court orders case for adjourned, Branch 38.  **All parties are notified that effective July 30, 2022 this case will be assigned to Judge Laura A. Crivello, Branch 36,  in Room 313 of the Safety Building.  Final pre-trial scheduled for August 11, 2022 at 01:30 pm.  Jury trial scheduled for September 12, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Court is down this afternoon. Parties emailed with new court date. Case adjourned, Branch 38.

Defendant Michael Jamal Elliott in court with attorney Michael J Cerniglia.  Defendant Michael Jamal Elliott in custody.  Samantha Raygo appeared for the State of Wisconsin. PARTIES APPEAR BY VIDEO. 
Case set for a Preliminary Hearing. Parties are advised that this case is assigned to Branch 38, Judge Wagner. Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing. Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court held colloquy with defendant. Probable cause has been found and the defendant is bound over for trial. Original Information e-filed, copy given to defense counsel who waived reading. Defense enters a plea of not guilty on behalf of the defendant. Case is adjourned to Br. 38.  Scheduling conference scheduled for May 26, 2022 at 01:15 pm.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Metcalfe's Market; S.C; A.M.W; S.A.C and B.P.K
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 4.

Defendant Michael Jamal Elliott in court with attorney Heather L. Johnson.  Defendant Michael Jamal Elliott in custody.  Grace M. Gall appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Michael Jamal Elliott appeared by video means with Attorney. Case retabbed to Branch 38 due to the nature of the charges.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Wagner, Branch 38. Defense enters a plea of NOT GUILTY as to misdemeanor count 2. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings. DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.
This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  
Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 6, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
